title: Corporate Education Partnerships | DePaul University, Chicago
content: DePaul Corporate Education Partnerships​ DePaul is in the Business of People + Purpose We meet individuals and organizations where they are and help them realize their full potential. We take pride in forging strategic partnerships with companies and organizations—designing tailored talent and workforce development solutions, crafted to elevate employees' skills and careers that align with the dynamic needs of today's ever-evolving workplace landscape. We believe our purpose is to build yours. Whether you are an individual looking to pursue a degree or find a certificate program to advance your career, or you are an established, global enterprise looking to engage with DePaul, we welcome the opportunity to be a trusted partner that can accelerate your purpose. For Employers Find out how DePaul could be your strategic partner. For Employees Take advantage of your educational benefits. Get Information To learn more about DePaul and its offerings,request information today.
